attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its time that people who kill and murder to face death, when i was younger i never heard of stabbings and gun crime but now its every day, the goverment need to take a hard line, and take control of the streets and again make it safe

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists, you may wish to add your name to an existing petition such as http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/PrisonBreak/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
